name: floral-healing
effect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
short_effect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.
